alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Madison and Carroll Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 645 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Berryville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Hindsville... Withrow Springs State Park... Carrollton... Rudd... Forum... Urbanette... Rule... Grandview... Clifty... Blue Eye... Rockhouse... Cabanal... Metalton... Connor... Coin... Alabam... Denver... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
